name: Tricky House Premium
description:
Escape from the Tricky House, full of tricks and mysterious puzzles. This escape room game will challenge your ability to solve puzzles!

Tricky House is a platform game with many unusual riddles and puzzle elements.
In every room, there is a new puzzle!

Each level is a room with a unique task (or several), and completing it will allow you to open the door and move to the next room.

If you like genres such as adventure, platforming, puzzles, quests, or just want to have a good time - then this game is for you.

Download Trick House right now and start your adventure!

100 levels

Nice graphics

Nice sound effects

Good controls

Interesting quests

Tricky puzzles and unusual riddles
